title: My GK is really poor. How do I improve my general knowledge beside reading newspaper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alright, you wanna improve your GK. Here is what you need to perform: Go to Library and read as much old newspapers as you can;Buy some Year Current affairs books. There’re some daily, weekly and Monthly current affair books also which are available on good books stores. (I don’t know about your locality, but, at my place those are available)Install good News applications in your smartphone. Read news through them daily and after 6 hrs in a day too. You may select the language and brand of app as per your preference. (I’m more of a English person, so, I like “Indian Express” very much, as it gives me good quality news without any kind of non-sense)Read some good magazines, like India Today.It’ll definitely take you some time to catch up, but, when you’ll, you found it total worth.  Love to help :) Thanks for asking!

Newspaper is good for GK but only if you continue reading it in detail .If you want to improve on GK then you have to be involved proactively with information through various apps and books like lucents GK . Note -you could improve it but still your level of Gk may easily relapse if you discontinue after some time also may forget what you grasped. So GK needs your commitment to be in touch with it through various resources you can easily find access to. Newspaper will help only in current affairs but Gk has huge historical ,economic ,games and sports events and datES.

Surf the internet and read about any stuff you like. Buy Any good GK book from market and make it a habit to read at least 2 pages daily and if you find something important write it down in a notebook and maintain it. Also watch informative channels like BBC , Discovery, NatGeo etc. GK is something which can be imparted in a day or month. It is a result of a regular habit.

Besides reading a newspaper you can also develop a habit of reading good books on literature.This will not only help you increase your knowledge but also develops your language and grip over it.Reading newspapers may help you gain knowledge on current affairs but reading books will impart knowledge on history, people, society and culture.Getting few GK books and reading them may not be very wise i suppose instead you can get some biographies of great personalities of the world.Such books will also help you know how to influence people through your words and become an effective speaker and finally a leader.Hope you’ll find this useful and all the best!

Okay so, for improving your general knowledge you have so many access to get better, you can go for, GK booksGK application in your deviceQuiz books/appsPlay chess, it excels your memory powerWatch news channelsPlay Loco and similar gamesGo through articles,magazines and news papers.Alright, many more are there. Just start by one you’ll notice progression.
